name: Plans on tracing cloth; size; scale
text: §502-19  Plans on tracing cloth; size; scale.  All plans must be on tracing cloth of good quality, and shall be of one of the following sizes, the figures indicating inches:  10 x 15; 15 x 21; 21 x 32; 30 x 36; 36 x 42; or 42, 48, or 54 wide without restriction as to length; which plans shall be prepared and drawn according to some one of the following scales: 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000, or 5000 feet to an inch. [L 1905, c 23, §3; RL 1925, §3136; am L 1929, c 117, §1; am L 1931, c 63, §4; RL 1935, §5122; RL 1945, §12722; RL 1955, §343-13; HRS §502-19]
